Package org.jgrapes.util.events

Class InitialConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<Void>
org.jgrapes.core.Event<Void>
org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate
org.jgrapes.util.events.InitialConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Future<Void>, Associator, Eligible
Direct Known Subclasses:
InitialPreferences
public class InitialConfiguration extends ConfigurationUpdate
A special ConfigurationUpdate event that is used for reporting the configuration on startup.

Components that have no need to distinguish the initial value propagation from real changes simply handle the ConfigurationUpdate events only.
